Create an empty rasterLayer based on a template

Source: R/utils-spatial.R
emptyraster.Rd

Create an empty rasterLayer based on a template

Usage

emptyraster(x, ...)

Arguments

x

a raster* object corresponding.

...

other arguments that can be passed to raster

Value

an empty raster, i.e. all cells are NA.

Examples

require(raster)
#> Loading required package: raster
#> Loading required package: sp
r <- raster(matrix(1:100, 5, 20))
emptyraster(r)
#> class      : RasterLayer 
#> dimensions : 5, 20, 100  (nrow, ncol, ncell)
#> resolution : 0.05, 0.2  (x, y)
#> extent     : 0, 1, 0, 1  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> crs        : NA 
#>
